mapper.select: SELECT r.RISK_LEVEL_NEW, u.ROC_ID FROM ESERVICE.dbo.TRANS_RISK_LEVEL r LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.dbo.TRANS t ON r.TRANS_NUM = t.TRANS_NUM LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.dbo.USERS u on t.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE r.TRANS_NUM = #{transNum}
mapper.update: update ESERVICE.dbo.INDIVIDUAL SET RISK_ATTR = #{riskLevelNew} where ROC_ID = #{rocId}
mapper.select: SELECT TOP 1 P.POLICY_NO FROM ESERVICE.dbo.POLICY P WHERE P.POLICY_NO IN (SELECT LIPM_INSU_NO FROM ESERVICE.DBO.LILIPM WHERE LIPM_ID = #{rocId}) AND (P.STATUS < 31 OR case when P.STATUS_DATE is null then getdate() else P.STATUS_DATE end > DATEADD(month, -24, getdate()) + 1) AND P.POLICY_TYPE IN (SELECT v.value FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER t CROSS APPLY STRING_SPLIT(t.PARAMETER_VALUE, ',')v WHERE t.PARAMETER_CODE = 'POLICY_INVESTMENT_TYPE')
